sen.j: 福知山都市圏（ふくちやまとしけん）は、京都府福知山市を中心とする都市圏である。
sen.e: The Fukuchiyama urban area is an urban area with Fukuchiyama City, in Kyoto Prefecture, as its center.
The Fukuchiyama urban area is an urban area with Fukuchiyama City, in Kyoto Prefecture, as its center.
The Fukuchiyama Urban Area includes Fukuchiyama City in Kyoto Prefecture and its surrounding area.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: 福知山市全域と、綾部市全域、京丹波町の一部、丹波市の一部を指す。
sen.e: It refers throughout to Fukuchiyama City and Ayabe City, part of Kyotanba-cho and Tanba City.
It refers throughout to Fukuchiyama City and Ayabe City, part of Kyotamba-cho and Tamba City.
The urban area covers the entire areas of the cities of Fukuchiyama and Ayabe, a part of Kyotanba-cho, and a part of Tanba City.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: 兵庫県の丹波市や周辺市町村からの通勤や買い物客も多く、舞鶴都市圏と並んで北近畿の中心的な都市圏となっている。
sen.e: Many people from Tanba City in Hyogo Prefecture and its surrounding municipalities commute to or go shopping in the area, and it is ranked with the Maizuru urban area as the leading urban area in the Northern Kinki region.

Many people from Tamba City in Hyogo Prefecture, and its surrounding municipalities, commute to or go shopping in the area, and it is ranked with the Maizuru urban area as the leading urban area in the Northern Kinki region.

The Fukuchiyama Urban Area, which has many commuters and shoppers from Tanba City in Hyogo Prefecture and its surrounding municipalities, has become the leading urban area in the Northern Kinki region with the Maizuru Urban Area.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。Tamba →Tanba

sen.j: 福知山都市圏は、2000年現在で13万6096人で北近畿最大。
sen.e: The Fukuchiyama urban area has the biggest population in the Northern Kinki region, 136,096 people as of 2000.
The Fukuchiyama urban area has the biggest population in the Northern Kinki region: 136,096 people as of 2000.
The Fukuchiyama urban area has the population of 136,096 as of 2000, which is the largest in the Northern Kinki region.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: 以前は綾部都市圏があったが、現在は福知山都市圏に入っている。
sen.e: There used to be an Ayabe urban area, but it is now part of the Fukuchiyama urban area.
There used to be an Ayabe urban area, but it is now part of the Fukuchiyama urban area.
There used to be an Ayabe Urban Area, which is now a part of the Fukuchiyama Urban Area.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: 福知山は昔から北近畿の商都であり、舞鶴市に人口では劣るものの、現在も集客力がある都市圏としてたくさんの企業が支店や営業所をおいている。
sen.e: Fukuchiyama has been a commercially prosperous city in the Northern Kinki region for a long time, and although the population is smaller than that of Maizuru city, many companies still have their branch offices and business offices there due to the urban area's ability to attract customers.

Fukuchiyama has been a commercially prosperous city in the Northern Kinki region for a long time, and although the population is smaller than that of Maizuru city, many companies still have their branch offices and business offices there, due to the urban area's ability to attract customers.

Although Fukuchiyama City has the population smaller than that of Maizuru City, it has long been a commercially prosperous city in the Northern Kinki region and has many companies established their branch offices and business offices due to the area's ability to attract customers.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: 福知山都市圏は集客力が高く、福知山市が掲げる北近畿の都という名称にあう商業や様々な分野での中心都市となっている。
sen.e: The Fukuchiyama urban area has great drawing power, which makes Fukuchiyama City a center of business and other fields, which fits the name the city gave itself, "capital of the northern Kinki region".

The Fukuchiyama urban area has great drawing power, which makes Fukuchiyama City a center of business and other fields, which fits the name the city gave itself, the 'capital of the northern Kinki region'.

The Fukuchiyama urban area has been attracting many visitors; accordingly, Fukuchiyama City has become a center of business and other fields so that the city has become deserved 'the capital of the northern Kinki region', the name it gave itself.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: 京都府北部の行政の中心地は舞鶴市であるが、他の面では福知山都市圏に特色あるものが多い。
sen.e: Although the center of administration in the north of Kyoto province is Maizuru City, there are many other distinctive features in the Fukuchiyama urban area.
Although the center of administration in the north of Kyoto province is Maizuru City, there are many other distinctive features in the Fukuchiyama urban area.
Although the center of administration in the north of Kyoto Prefecture is Maizuru City, the Fukuchiyama urban area has many other distinctive features.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。Kyoto province→Kyoto Prefecture

sen.j: 教育では、福知山市だけで公立高校が4校、私立高校が4校の合計8校があり、周辺市町からの就学を集めている。
sen.e: Regarding education, there are eight high schools--four prefectural and four private schools--just in Fukuchiyama City and students in the surrounding cities and towns attend them.
Regarding education, there are eight high schools--four prefectural and four private schools--just in Fukuchiyama City and students in the surrounding cities and towns attend them.
Concerning education, in Fukuchiyama City, there are eight high schools (four prefectural and four private) which have their students from the surrounding municipalities.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: また京都府北部では唯一の私立中学校や、北近畿初の4年制大学を有する。
sen.e: It also has the only private junior high school in the north of Kyoto Prefecture and the first four-year college founded in the northern Kinki area.
It also has the only private junior high school in the north of Kyoto Prefecture and the first four-year college founded in the northern Kinki area.
Also in Fukuchiyama City, there are the only private junior high school in the northern part of Kyoto Prefecture and the first four-year college founded in the northern Kinki area.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: 工業では、国内有数の内陸工業団地、長田野工業団地があり、その総出荷額は年々増加している。
sen.e: When considering industries, there is the Osadano Industrial Park, one of the leading inland industrial parks, and the total shipment value has been increasing year by year.
In terms of industries, there is the Osadano Industrial Park, one of the leading inland industrial parks, and the total shipment value has been increasing year by year.
In the field of manufacturing industry, there is the Osadano Industrial Park (one of the largest inland industrial parks) in the city and its total value of annual shipment has been increasing.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: 商業では、中心市街地の数個の商店街と都市型大型店福知山ファミリーやさとう (京都府)にて繁栄していた。
sen.e: As for business there, there had been prosperous shopping streets in the central urban district and large-scale urban stores such as Fukuchiyama Family and SATO (Kyoyo Prefecture).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: As for business there, there had been prosperous shopping streets in the central urban district and large-scale urban stores such as Fukuchiyama Family and SATO (Kyoyo Prefecture).

In the field of commerce, the city was once flourished with shopping streets in the central urban district and metropolitan large-scale retail stores including Fukuchiyama Family and SATO (in Kyoto Prefecture).
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。Kyoto prefecture→Kyoto Prefecture

sen.j: が、最近ではジャスコ福知山店(当市最大売り場面積店舗）や大型ディスカウント店のプラント (企業)福知山店などが出店し、数多くのロードサイド店舗が増加している。
sen.e: But recently the JUSCO Fukuchiyama store (a store with the biggest salesroom area in the city) and the SUPER CENTER PLANT-3 Fukuchiyama store (a large-scale discount store) have opened, and many stores have been growing up along the major roads ("road side stores").
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: But recently the JUSCO Fukuchiyama store (a store with the biggest salesroom area in the city) and the SUPER CENTER PLANT-3 Fukuchiyama store (a large-scale discount store) have opened, and many stores have been growing up along the major roads ("road side stores").

Recently, the JUSCO Fukuchiyama store (whose sales floor area is the biggest in the city) and the SUPER CENTER PLANT-3 Fukuchiyama store (a large-scale discount store) have opened, and many roadside stores in fringe roadside have opened one after another along the major roads.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: それに対し、福知山駅高架化に伴う中心市街地活性化策としての駅前開発が進められている。
sen.e: On the other hand, following a plan to elevate Fukuchiyama Station, development of the area in front of the station has been advanced to stimulate the central urban district.
On the other hand, following a plan to elevate Fukuchiyama Station, development of the area in front of the station has been advanced to stimulate the central urban district.
On the other hand, following a plan to elevate Fukuchiyama Station, development of the area in front of the station has been advanced to stimulate the central urban district.

sen.j: 公共図書館が入った北近畿の都センター建設や福知山市が進める福知山駅北大規模街区による商業施設にコーナン福知山駅前店（店舗面積約9000平方㍍）がある。
sen.e: There are buildings to be constructed such as the Kita-kinki no miyako center with a public library in it and the store of Home Center Kohnan (Kohnan Shoji Co., Ltd) in front of Fukuchiyama station (with a store area of 9,000 square meters) in a commercial construction at a large-scale block on the north side of Fukuchiyama Station, which is being developed by Fukuchiyama City.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: There are buildings to be constructed such as the Kita-kinki no miyako center with a public library in it and the store of Home Center Kohnan (Kohnan Shoji Co., Ltd) in front of Fukuchiyama station (with a store area of 9,000 square meters) in a commercial construction zone at a large-scale block on the north side of Fukuchiyama Station, which is being developed by Fukuchiyama City.

There are buildings to be constructed such as the Kita-kinki no miyako center with a public library and the store of Home Center Kohnan (Kohnan Shoji Co., Ltd) in front of Fukuchiyama Station (with a store area of 9,000 square meters) in a commercial construction zone at a large-scale block on the north side of Fukuchiyama Station, which is being developed by Fukuchiyama City.

sen.j: また駅南に家電量販店最大手ヤマダ電機テックランド福知山店の出店や大手スポーツ用品量販店ヒマラヤ (企業)が出店をしており期待がふくらんでいる。
sen.e: Also, the leading electrical appliance store in sales volume, Yamada Denki Techland Fukuchiyama, and a leading sports shop and mass retailer, HIMARAYA Co.,Ltd, have their shops on the south side of the station, and people are filled with hope.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Also, the leading electrical appliance store in sales volume, Yamada Denki Techland Fukuchiyama, and a leading sports shop and mass retailer, HIMARAYA Co.,Ltd, have their shops on the south side of the station, raising the expectations of all who visit the station.

Also, the leading electrical appliance store in sales volume, Yamada Denki Techland Fukuchiyama, and a leading sports shop and mass retailer, HIMARAYA, have their shops on the south side of the station, raising the expectations of all who visit the station.
sen.cmt: Webでは、（企業）はポップアップヒントのみの文字列のため、削除しました。

sen.j: ほかにも駅南の国道９号線沿いに大規模な開発センタムシティ福知山や、フレスポ福知山、ユニクロ、TSUTAYA、洋服の青山、かっぱ寿司、ホンダ、吉野家、玉姫殿、マクドナルド、しまむら、和食さとなど大手の店がたくさん並んでいる。
sen.e: Additionally, large-scale development has proceeded along the National Highway 9 on the south side of the station, and there are many big companies' stores there such as Centum City Fukuchiyama, Frespo Fukuchiyama, UNIQLO Co.,Ltd., TSUTAYA, Yofuku no Aoyama (ready-made menswear), Kappa Zushi (Sushi restaurant), a Honda dealership, a Yoshinoya's restaurant, Tamahimeden (a wedding hall), McDonald's, SHIMAMURA, and Washoku Sato (restaurant).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Additionally, large-scale development has proceeded along the National Highway 9 on the south side of the station, and there are many big company stores there such as Centum City Fukuchiyama, Frespo Fukuchiyama, UNIQLO Co.,Ltd., TSUTAYA, Yofuku no Aoyama (ready-made menswear), Kappa Zushi (Sushi restaurant), a Honda dealership, a Yoshinoya restaurant, Tamahimeden (a wedding hall), McDonald's, SHIMAMURA, and Washoku Sato (restaurant).

Additionally, large-scale development has proceeded along the National Route 9 on the south side of the station, and there are many big company stores such as Centum City Fukuchiyama (complex), Frespo Fukuchiyama (a shopping mall), UNIQLO (clothing shop), TSUTAYA (rental shop), Yofuku no Aoyama (ready-made men's wear), Kappa Zushi (Sushi restaurant), a Honda dealership (car dealer), a Yoshinoya restaurant, Tamahimeden (a wedding hall), McDonald's, SHIMAMURA (clothing shop), and Washoku Sato (restaurant).

sen.j: ビルや中高層マンション、ホテルがたくさん立ち並び、これからも開発が進むことは間違いない。
sen.e: On top of that, there are many buildings, high-and medium-rise apartment buildings and hotels lining both sides of the street, and it is certain that the development will continue to advance.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Moreover, there are many buildings, high-and medium-rise apartments and hotels lining both sides of the street, and it is certain that the development will continue to advance.
Moreover, there are many buildings, high-and medium-rise apartments and hotels lining both sides of the street, and it is certain that the development will continue to advance.

sen.j: 人口は、周辺市町では減少しているのに対し、福知山市だけを見る限りここ最近まで微増傾向であった。
sen.e: While the population of the surrounding cities and towns has been decreasing, until recently only that of Fukuchiyama City had seemed to inch up.
While the population of the surrounding cities and towns has been decreasing, until recently only that of Fukuchiyama City has seemed to have inched up.
While the population of the surrounding cities and towns has been decreasing, until recently only that of Fukuchiyama City has seemed to have inched up.

sen.j: 地価としては、福知山駅北が北近畿の中で最も高額であるが、現在も下落している。
sen.e: As for property values there, the property values to the north of Fukuchiyama Station are among the highest in the northern Kinki area, though they are presently falling.
As for property values there, the property values to the north of Fukuchiyama Station are among the highest in the northern Kinki area, though they are presently falling.
As for property values there, the property values to the north of Fukuchiyama Station are among the highest in the northern Kinki area, although they are presently falling.

sen.j: しかし先行して開発されている福知山駅南は上昇傾向にある。
sen.e: However, the property values on the south side of Fukuchiyama Station, which has been developed in advance, are showing a tendency to rise.
However, the property values on the south side of Fukuchiyama Station, which has been developed in advance, are showing a tendency to rise.
However, the property values on the south side of Fukuchiyama Station, which has been developed in advance, are showing a tendency to rise.

sen.j: また福知山市は、交通の要衝としての一面を持っている。
sen.e: Fukuchiyama City also has the aspect of a junction of transportation.
Fukuchiyama City also has all the character of a transportation hub.
Fukuchiyama City also has all the character of a transportation hub.

sen.j: 都市雇用圏（10%通勤圏）の変遷
sen.e: The change in Urban Employment Area (UEA) (the suburbs more than 10% of whose populations are commuting to the central city)
Transformation into an Urban Employment Area (UEA) (suburbs with more than 10% of the population commuting to the central city)
Transformation into an Urban Employment Area (UEA) (suburbs with more than 10% of the population commuting to the central city)

sen.j: 金本良嗣・徳岡一幸によって提案された都市圏。
sen.e: It is the urban area that was proposed by Yoshitsugu KANEMOTO and Kazuyuki TOKUOKA.
It is an urban area proposed by Yoshitsugu KANEMOTO and Kazuyuki TOKUOKA.
It is an urban area proposed by Yoshitsugu KANEMOTO and Kazuyuki TOKUOKA.

sen.j: 細かい定義等は都市雇用圏に則する。
sen.e: The detailed definitions and explanations are based on Urban Employment Area (UEA).
The detailed definitions and explanations are based on Urban Employment Area (UEA).
The detailed definitions and explanations are based on Urban Employment Area (UEA).

sen.j: 一般的な都市圏の定義については都市圏を参照のこと。
sen.e: See "urban areas" to know about the definition of a general urban area.
See 'Urban Areas' to for more information on the definition of a general urban area.
See Urban Areas to for more information on the definition of a general urban area.
sen.cmt: クォーテーションをのぞきました。

sen.j: ※10%通勤圏に入っていない自治体は、各統計年の欄で灰色かつ「-」で示す。
sen.e: *The blanks in gray and with the symbol "-" in them among the columns of statistical years in the chart show local governments that are not included among suburbs more than 10% of whose populations are commuting to the central city.

* The blanks in gray and with the hyphen (-) in them among the columns of statistical years in the chart show local governments that are not included among the suburbs with more than 10% of the population to the central city.

* The blanks in gray and with the hyphen (-) in them among the columns of statistical years in the chart show local governments that are not included among the suburbs with more than 10% of the population to the central city.

sen.j: - 兵庫県氷上町、柏原町、青垣町、春日町、山南町、市島町が新設合併し丹波市が発足。
sen.e: Hikami-cho, Kaibara-cho, Aogaki-cho, Kasuga-cho, Sannan-cho and Ichijima-cho in Hyogo Prefecture were consolidated, and Tanba City came into being.
Hikami-cho, Kaibara-cho, Aogaki-cho, Kasuga-cho, Sannan-cho and Ichijima-cho in Hyogo Prefecture were consolidated, and Tamba City was the result.
Hikami-cho, Kaibara-cho, Aogaki-cho, Kasuga-cho, Sannan-cho and Ichijima-cho in Hyogo Prefecture were consolidated, and Tanba City was the result.
On October 11, 2005
On October 11, 2005
On October 11, 2005

sen.j: - 京都府丹波町、瑞穂町、和知町が新設合併し京丹波町が発足。
sen.e: Tanba-cho, Mizuho-cho and Wachi-cho, in Kyoto Prefecture were consolidated and Kyotanba-cho came into being.
Tamba-cho, Mizuho-cho and Wachi-cho, in Kyoto Prefecture were consolidated and Kyotamba-cho came into being.
Tanba-cho, Mizuho-cho and Wachi-cho, in Kyoto Prefecture were consolidated and Kyotanba-cho came into being.
On January 1, 2006
On January 1, 2006
On January 1, 2006

sen.j: - 京都府福知山市に大江町、三和町、夜久野町を編入。
sen.e: Oe-cho, Miwa-cho, and Yakuno-cho were incorporated into Fukuchiyama City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Oe-cho, Miwa-cho, and Yakuno-cho were incorporated into Fukuchiyama City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Oe-cho, Miwa-cho, and Yakuno-cho were incorporated into Fukuchiyama City, Kyoto Prefecture.
